synopsis.text: Academy's tennis team, led by the prodigious Ryoma Echizen, embarks on an unconventional day of training, swapping their familiar courts for the challenging terrain of a mountainous tennis resort. The team is braced for a grueling regimen, known to leave even the most resilient players speechless for days. However, their plans take an unexpected turn when they discover their courts have been overtaken by a group of college tennis players. With the threat of their coach's dreaded 'special juice' hanging over their heads, the team faces a daunting task. Ryoma, undeterred by the situation, takes it upon himself to challenge the older players, transforming the day into a thrilling showdown between youthful determination and seasoned experience. Will the young prodigy rise to the occasion and reclaim their rightful courts?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
